title: Trucker blockade snarls US-Mexico border over Texas order - The Associated Press
content:
1. Trucker blockade snarls US-Mexico border over Texas order  The Associated Press
  2. Gov. Abbott speaks on border security policy  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  3. Psaki slams Gov. Abbott over truck inspections at Texas-Mexico border, blames him for price increases  Fox News
  4. Editorial: Mad truckers, molded strawberries latest fruits of Abbott’s border security crackdown  Houston Chronicle
  5. Delays, closures and chaos mount at Texas-Mexico border crossings  ABC13 Houston
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — One of the busiest trade ports on the U.S.-Mexico border remained effectively closed Wednesday as frustration and traffic snarls mounted over orders by Texas Gov. Greg Abbott requiring extra inspections of commercial trucks as part of the Republican’s sprawling border security operation.
